title: Belle And Mulan /the Yaoguai 2x11 the outsider
author: ONCEUPON a HORRORSTORY
comment: We honestly needed more episodes with Belle going on quests and having adventures that didn’t relate to Rumple. This episode was a great example of Belle’s strengths and what she was capable of, especially when she figured out the truth about the Yarogui and ended up saving someone. The girl just doesn’t get the recognition she deserves. (And yes, I’m a tad bias)
Wtf was belle thinking trying to fight that thing with a needle
description: Mulan saves Belle from the Yaoguai
